diskEncryption.title: Disk Encryption Management
diskEncryption.subtitle: Manage system disk encryption status
diskEncryption.notEncryptedWarning: Your disk is not encrypted. It is recommended to enable full disk encryption to protect your data security.
diskEncryption.recoveryKeyWarning: No recovery key detected. It is recommended to set a recovery key so that data can be recovered if you forget your password.
diskEncryption.enableWarningDesc: Enabling disk encryption requires administrator privileges and may take a long time to complete. Do not turn off the computer during the encryption process.
diskEncryption.backupData: Make sure you have backed up important data
diskEncryption.encryptionTime: Encryption process may take several hours
diskEncryption.disableWarningDesc: Disabling disk encryption will make your data vulnerable to unauthorized access. It is recommended to disable only when necessary.
diskEncryption.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable encryption for

macos.filevault: Enable FileVault 2 full disk encryption to protect data on Mac
macos.strongPassword: Use a strong password to protect your user account
macos.recoveryKey: Save the recovery key to iCloud or print and store safely
macos.findMyMac: Enable Find My Mac to remotely lock or wipe if device is lost
macos.firmwarePassword: Ensure firmware password is enabled to prevent unauthorized boot

windows.bitlocker: Enable BitLocker full disk encryption to protect data security
windows.tpm: Ensure your device supports TPM chip for best security
windows.recoveryKey: Save the recovery key to a safe location (e.g., Microsoft account or USB drive)
windows.checkStatus: Regularly check BitLocker status and recovery key validity
windows.encryptAll: Consider encrypting all data drives, not just the system disk

linux.luks: Use LUKS for full disk encryption to protect data
linux.installEncrypt: Choose encryption option during system installation for best experience
linux.backupHeader: Backup LUKS header information to prevent data loss
linux.autoUnlock: Consider using TPM or key file for automatic unlock

permission.enterAdminPassword: Please enter your administrator password in the system dialog
permission.step1Desc: To clean system logs and temporary files, the app needs administrator permission.
permission.step1Note: Once authorized, no password required for this session.
permission.adminCleanup: Execute cleanup operations requiring admin privileges
permission.authFailRetry: If authorization fails repeatedly, try restarting the app as administrator
permission.step2Desc: To access and clean all system files, the app needs "Full Disk Access" permission.
permission.step2Note: This is a macOS security requirement and must be enabled in System Settings.
permission.step2Action1: Click the "Open System Settings" button below
permission.step2Action2: Find this app in the "Full Disk Access" list
permission.step2Action3: Toggle the switch next to the app to enable Full Disk Access
permission.noPermissionWarning: Without this permission, some system logs and app data may not be cleaned.
permission.restartForPermission: Restart the app and request permission?

license.upgradeMessage: Upgrade to Pro to unlock this feature
